text: The Men's 800 metre freestyle competition at the 2019 World Championships was held on 23 and 24 July 2019.ScheduleStart list The defending champion was Gabriele Detti, but he finished 5th in the final. The champion, Gregorio Paltrinieri, was the defending bronze medalist. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. ==Results== ===Heats=== The heats were held on 23 July at 11:05.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
